Co-ordinator of the intelligence community, accounting officer for the Single Intelligence Account, and line manager of the Heads of Intelligence Agencies. The National Security Adviser's remit includes: Foreign and Defence Policy; Counter Terrorism; Intelligence Policy; The governance and resourcing of the secret intelligence agencies; Cyber Security; Resilience and crisis management.
